sentences.sentence: Republics will have voting rights proportionate to the size of their economies.
sentences.translation: 各共和国将拥有与其经济规模成比例的选举权。

sentences.sentence: The number of accidents is proportionate to the increased volume of traffic.
sentences.translation: 交通事故的数字与交通量的增长成正比。

sentences.sentence: Enlarged material powers spell enlarged peril if there is not proportionate growth of the soul.
sentences.translation: 如果灵魂的生长发育不相称的话，那么，扩张的物质力量就会带来扩大化的危险。
